ipIsBanned: L'adresse IP de votre proxy {1} a été bannie car vous avez effectué trop de requête sur The Undermine Journal.
bannedContact: Vous pouvez envoyer un message à contact page si vous souhaitez plus d'informations
captchaDirections: Vous avez consulté beaucoup de pages récemment. To make sure you're not a script, please select all the {1} without helms.
maintenanceGoblins: Les gobelins de The Undermine Journal travaillent dans les coulisses sur une maintenance du site.
expectOnline: Nous serons à nouveau en ligne dans {1}.
pleaseComeBack: S'il vous plait, revenez plus tard.
yourSource: ...votre source d'informations pour les données et statistiques de l'hotel des ventes de World of Warcraft.
snapshotsDesc: Quantité disponible et prix du marché de {1} vus récemment à l'HV sur le serveur {2}.
snapshotsSellerDesc: Here you'll find the amount of new and total auctions by this seller at each snapshot.
dailySummaryDesc: Quantité maximum disponible et prix de l'objet chaque jour. La moyenne du prix par jour est incluse afin de comparer.
dailyDetailsDesc: Ce tableau est similaire à l'aperçu quotidien mais inclus le prix du marché "OHLC" quotidien de l'objet, avec les quantités minimales, moyennes et maximales disponibles.
auctionCountDesc: This chart counts the number of new auctions posted on each day, along with an estimate of how many of them ended up expired.
pricingHeatMapDesc: Cette heat map vous aide à identifier si le moment de journée a une influence sur le prix
quantityHeatMapDesc: Cette heat map vous montre les quantités disponibles à différents moments de la journée
ageHeatMapDesc: Cette heat map vous montre la durée de vie moyenne de l'enchère à différents moments de la journée. Une durée de vie plus courte signifie une activité plus importante des vendeurs.
regionalDailySummaryDesc: Quantité disponible, et prix moyen du marché, chaque jour de l'objet à traver l'ensemble des serveurs de la région {1}.
regionalPricesDesc: Ce tableau montre le prix et la quantité disponible de {1} sur l'ensemble des serveurs de la région {2}.
pricePopScatterDesc: This scatter plot has the same data as above, but shows the price relative to the realm population, provided by {1}.
currentAuctionsDesc: Voici la liste complète des enchères pour ce {1} depuis la dernière capture. Cliquez sur le nom d'un vendeur pour plus de détails sur celui-ci.
recentSellersDesc: These sellers posted the greatest quantity of {1} recently.
auctionsByItemClassDesc: This shows the relative count of auctions recently posted by this seller, grouped by item class and subclass.
volatilePrice: Le prix du marché est très volatil
typicalAuctionAge: Durée de vie moyenne de l'enchère
maxAuctionAge: Durée de vie maximum de l'enchère
name: Nom
expandBreeds: Cliquez "({1})" dans la colonne races pour étendre la ligne aux différentes races.
pasteInItems: In the box below, paste in a list of item IDs to generate a custom category page with pricing information.
zoomClickDrag: Click and drag dans la zone pour zoomer

SubscriptionErrors.statesetup: Error setting up login, please try again later.
SubscriptionErrors.nohttps: Error: We could not establish HTTPS connection.
SubscriptionErrors.nosession: Error: we could not make a new user session. Please try again.
SubscriptionErrors.nostate: Error: We could not find the state returned by Battle.net. Please try again.
SubscriptionErrors.notoken: Error: Battle.net returned no access token response. Please try again.
SubscriptionErrors.badtoken: Error: Battle.net returned an invalid access token response. Please try again.
SubscriptionErrors.missingtoken: Error: Battle.net did not return an access token. Please try again.
SubscriptionErrors.nouser: Error: Battle.net returned no response when requesting your user ID with the access token. Please try again.
SubscriptionErrors.baduser: Error: Battle.net returned an invalid response when requesting your user ID with the access token. Please try again.
SubscriptionErrors.missinguser: Error: Battle.net returned an incomplete response when requesting your user ID with the access token. Please try again.
SubscriptionErrors.nodata: Error fetching subscription data, please try again.
SubscriptionErrors.paidcancel: You've cancelled the payment process. No changes have been made to your subscription.
SubscriptionErrors.paidpending: Thank you for your payment. Your subscription should be processed within an hour.
SubscriptionErrors.paidfinish: Thank you for your payment. Your subscription should be updated.
SubscriptionErrors.paiderror:
There was an issue processing your payment.
If your paid subscription is not extended soon, please contact us via the Contact link at the bottom of the page.

emailFooter: This email was sent by request from The Undermine Journal at theunderminejournal.com. If you reply to this email, your address (%s) will be removed from any and all accounts on our site.
emailBlocklistHTML: If you want never to receive email from The Undermine Journal again, you can click here to be added to our blocklist.
emailBlocklistText: If you want never to receive email from The Undermine Journal again, you can visit %s and enter this message ID: %s.
confirmPolicyAcceptance: Please confirm your acceptance of our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
acceptPolicyCheckbox: I accept the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
acceptSupportEnglish: I accept that support requests must be serviced in the English language.

EmailStatus.invalid: The Email address you supplied is invalid. Please fix it and try again.
EmailStatus.verify: Check your mail, and enter the verification code we sent to your address.

subMessageFetchError: Error fetching message, please try again.
messageDeliveryDesc: All our messages and notifications to you will be shown in the section above.
rssDesc: There's an RSS feed for your messages here.
setAddressInstruction: You can also set your contact information to have new messages sent to your address.
emailVerificationMessage:
We received your request for us to Email you at this address. Please log in to The Undermine Journal and enter this verification code:

%s
emailAddressUpdatedMessage:
We updated your email address per your request.

Please check your mail at %s and enter the verification code which we sent there.
emailAddressRemovedMessage: We removed your email address from our system per your request.
emailAddressRemovedError: We removed your old email address from our system, but failed to replace it with the new address you specified.
emailAddressRemovedBounce: We removed your email address %s from our system because we received a reply or bounce-back from your mail server, or because you have chosen to block your address from our system.
emailVerificationResentMessage:
We re-sent the verification code to your email per your request.

Please check your mail at %s and enter the verification code which we sent there.
emailAddressVerifiedMessage: You successfully verified your control over the address %s, and The Undermine Journal will send all your future messages there.
marketNotificationsDesc: Tell us here how you want to be notified when the market changes.
wantToKnowAvailAnywhere: Want to know when {1} is available on any realm?
wantToKnowAvail: Want to know when {1} is available?
wantToKnowPrice: Want to know when {1} costs less than {2}?
logInToFreeSub: Log in to a free subscription and set up some notifications!
visitItemPages: Visit item pages to define your market notifications!
buyMoreThanZero: Must buy a quantity over zero.
tellMeAboutNewAuctions: Tell me about new auctions with:
visitUnusualCategory: Visit the Unusual Items category to watch for rare items!
subscriptionWelcomeMessage:
Welcome to your Subscription page at The Undermine Journal. Thanks for logging in.

On this page, you can find all the recent messages we've sent to you, along with your notifications and other site settings.
notificationsMessage: The items above have reached thresholds that you've set. Notifications for these events will automatically reset when the market condition is no longer observed, and you will be notified when they happen again after that. To update your notifications or email preferences, please log in to your subscription.
subscriptionTimeAddedMessage: Your paid subscription has been extended.
subscriptionTimeRemovedMessage: Your paid subscription time has been reduced, probably due to a refund or a transaction reversal. If this was not your intent, please log in to your subscription and contact us via the Contact form.
freeSubscriptionAccount: Your account is on the free subscription tier.
clickToExtendSubscription: Click below to extend your paid subscription by {1} days for {2}. Note: It may require an hour or more to process the payment.
notificationPeriodDesc: Select how much time you prefer between each Market Notifications message.
notificationPeriodNext: Your next message will be generated {1}.
